subSubSection.paragraph:
Vastitermes Sjöstedt, 1926d: 27
[junior subjective synonym of
Coptotermes Wasmann, 1896
].

TYPE SPECIES:
Calotermes paradoxus Sjöstedt, 1911
by original designation. — Emerson, 1928b: 423 •
Vastitermes
; synonymized with
Coptotermes .

Oligocrinitermes Xia and He, 1986: 160, 180 [proposed as a subgenus of
Coptotermes
; however, since no type species was selected, it is an unavailable name].

— Huang et al., 2000: 300 •
Coptotermes ( Oligocrinitermes )
; key [subgenus name invalid, as no type species designated].

Polycrinitermes Xia and He, 1986: 157, 178 [proposed as a subgenus of
Coptotermes
; however, since no type species was selected, it is an unavailable name].

— Huang et al., 2000: 300
Coptotermes ( Polycrinitermes )
; key [subgenus name invalid, as no type species designated].
▲ 67 living species, 4 fossil species.
Oriental Region ; Palaearctic Region ; Papuan Region .

Termes acinaciformis Froggatt, 1898: 740–741
(imago, soldier), pl. 34, figs. 7, 7a.
TYPE DATA: Lectotype : AMNH imago ♂ . Paralectotypes : AMNH imago, soldiers, ANIC soldier,
NMV imagoes, soldiers, workers.
LECTOTYPE DESIGNATION: Hill, 1942: 147 • “Hololectotype” [= lectotype ] designated.
TYPE LOCALITY: Australia : Western Australia : Halls Creek.

— French, 1893: 136, 137, pl. 32 •
Termes australis
[misidentification]; imago =
acinaciformis
or
flavus
fide Hill, 1926: 203.

— Froggatt, 1898: 721 •

[some localities for
acinaciformis
].

; New Zealand : introduced
and established.

Termes ( Coptotermes ) raffrayi
Wasmann, 1900b: 244–245
(soldier).

paragraph.materialsCitation: TYPE DATA: Holotype : NHMM soldier ( holotype by monotypy).

subSubSection.paragraph: TYPE LOCALITY: Australia : Western Australia : Swan River.

Eutermes ( Coptotermes ) amanii
Sjöstedt, 1911b: 17–18
(soldier, worker).
TYPE DATA: Syntypes : NHRM soldiers, workers, AMNH soldiers, workers, IEA soldiers, workers,
NCIP soldier [incorrectly cited as paratype by Ruelle, 1975b].
TYPE LOCALITY: Tanzania : Usambara: Amani.
